attributes.action: To take Doctors out of surgeries and replace them with qualified practitioner nursing staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would allow Doctors to practice their skills and return to hospitals treating those who have a greater need of their services.  We believe that Qualified Nurses are the backbone of the NHS and have the underpinning knowledge and experience to issue prescriptions and administer drugs.
